titles.title: "Kyou no Teki wa Kyou no Tomo" by Misa "Kenka Suru Hodo Naka ga Ii" by En "Iya yo Iya yo mo Suki no Uchi!?" by Sakurako
Rivalité d`un jour ne dure pas toujours. Qui aime bien châtie bien. On peut très bien dire blanc mais penser noir.
Yesterday`s Foe Is Today`s Friend. Good Enough Friends to Have Fights. No Doesn`t Always Mean No.
「昨日の敵は今日の友」by美砂 「喧嘩するほど仲がいい」by円 「いやよいやよも好きのうち!」by桜子
